26 static chaos::uint64 g_next_callback_id = 0;
27 
28 } // namespace anonymous
29 
48 template<typename... function_parameters>
49 class CallbackManager
50 {
51 public:
52 
53  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
54  // CONSTRUCTOR
55  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
56 
60  CallbackManager()
61  {
62  }
63 
64  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
65  // PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS
66  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
67 
82  chaos::uint64 register_function(
83  void (*callback_function)(function_parameters...))
84  {
85  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
86  chaos::uint64 id = g_next_callback_id++;
87  // this callback shouldn't be registered
88  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
89 
90  // store this function mapped under the id
91  m_callback_funcs[id] = callback_function;
92  return id;
93  }
94 
107  void unregister_function(chaos::uint64 id)
108  {
109  // ensure the id is associated with this object
110  if (!has_function(id))
111  {
112  chaos::uni::UTF8String error_message;
113  error_message << "CallbackManager does not have a callback "
114  << "function with the id: " << id;
115 
116  throw chaos::ex::KeyError( error_message );
117  }
118  // remove the id and function from the map
119  m_callback_funcs.erase(id);
120  }
121 
126  bool has_function(chaos::uint64 id) const
127  {
128  // is this id stored in the map?
129  return m_callback_funcs.find(id) != m_callback_funcs.end();
130  }
131 
138  void (*get_function(chaos::uint64 id) const)(function_parameters...)
139  {
140  // ensure the id is associated with this object
141  if (!has_function(id))
142  {
143  chaos::uni::UTF8String error_message;
144  error_message << "CallbackManager does not have a callback "
145  << "function with the id: " << id;
146  throw chaos::ex::KeyError( error_message );
147  }
148  // return the function
149  return m_callback_funcs[id];
150  }
151 
156  void trigger(function_parameters... params)
157  {
158  // iterate over the attached functions and call them
159  CHAOS_FOR_EACH(it, m_callback_funcs)
160  {
161  (*it)(params)
162  }
163  }
164 
165 private:
166 
167  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
168  // PRIVATE ATTRIBUTES
169  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
170 
174  std::map<chaos::uint64, void (*)(function_parameters...)> m_callback_funcs;
175 };
176 
177 } // namespace core
178 } // namespace sigma
179 
180 #endif
